channel.title: Process QuickNotes and mail pending tasks
channel.description:
## What is QuickNotes?
Use Drafts to quickly note down tasks and notes. And if you do a task quickly, mark it done. Do you want to clean up the draft and receive any pending tasks per mail? Invoke **QuickNotes** action.
**QuickNotes** is a Drafts action which:
1. parses current draft looking for tasks and notes 2. sends each pending task individually per mail, e.g., to allow **Outlook** users to flag them as a task 3. archives current draft by appending it into the monthly **QuickNotes** archive draft 4. optionally moves current draft to trash
Action: https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/1eR Repo: https://github.com/vecepet/quick-notes

item.dc:creator: iCooper
item.description:
mikecufc:

Is there any way to have the tasks go into OmniFocus rather than email to Outlook?!

I do not have any experience with OmniFocus, sorry.

However, looking quickly at the Integration Guide Using OmniFocus with Drafts, it looks like you can send a mail to OmniFocus, so just configure the correct email address after installing and running QuickNotes.

OmniFocus offers the ability to email tasks to OmniFocus using Mail Drop .

Or, perhaps, there seem to be already many actions cooperating with OmniFocus, e.g., Markdown Tasks to OmniFocus
